queries.name: CFL
queries.query: select trunc(logtime), sum(totalrequest),method from tblapilogsummery where applicationname='CFLWebService' and method like '%SMSForwading.svc%' group by trunc(logtime), method order by 1 desc

queries.name: Register_CPID
queries.query: select trunc(logtime), sum(totalrequest),method from tblapilogsummery where applicationname='APIHUB2' and method like '%registerCpid%' group by trunc(logtime),method order by 1 desc
